note.p: Education: Merchant Taylors' School, London; St John's College, Oxford; BA (1730), MA (1734), BD (1739), DD (1743); Incorporated at Cambridge (1749)
Career: Fellow of St John's (1726-1786); Rector of Bell Broughton, Worcestershire; Rector of St Nicholas, Worcester
Authority: Birth date from V Sillery, St John's College, Oxford
Notes: Venn gives date of birth as 15 Nov 1708
